headline: Manicotti Shells
name: Manicotti Shells
description: Make your own manicotti shells with just four ingredients. Then fill them with your favorite filling, fold over the sides, and bake with sauce and cheese.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix flour, water, eggs, and salt together in a bowl until a thin, smooth batter forms.

Lightly spray a griddle with cooking spray and heat over medium-low heat. Spoon about 1/4 cup batter into the warm skillet and cook until a film forms on top. Carefully remove to a plate and repeat to make remaining shells.
